attributes.action: Give Rugby Union Referee Nigel Owens a knighthood.
attributes.background: Nigel Owens is an icon and admired by many, many people. His quick wit and humour on the field and his work off it in communities is amazing. He has risen up from the depths of despair and depression to become one of the most loved people in a wonderful sport.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
